languages.text: "Ни в коем случае, шерин, я не расстанусь с сим сокровищем — Великий тому свидетель, а также все звезды Простора, что россыпью жемчуга сияют во тьме галактики! Однако же к вам у меня остался один вопрос..." {n}Джай заговорщически улыбается, подается вперед и под косые взгляды офицеров бесстыже заглядывает в глаза, ожидая ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ни в коем случае, шерин, я не расстанусь с сим сокровищем — Великий тому свидетель, а также все звезды Простора, что россыпью жемчуга сияют во тьме галактики! Однако же к вам у меня остался один вопрос..." {n}Джай заговорщически улыбается, подается вперед и под косые взгляды офицеров бесстыже заглядывает в глаза, ожидая ответа.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ни в коем случае, шерин, я не расстанусь с сим сокровищем — Великий тому свидетель, а также все звезды Простора, что россыпью жемчуга сияют во тьме галактики! Однако же к вам у меня остался один вопрос..." {n}Джай заговорщически улыбается, подается вперед и под косые взгляды офицеров бесстыже заглядывает в глаза, ожидая ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward and shamelessly stares you in the eye, completely disregarding the officers' disapproving looks as she waits for the reply.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “没有任何事情能让我放弃这件珍宝，亲爱的。愿至高无上的神皇见证这一切！祂与科罗努斯扩区的群星，仿佛散落在银河系的珍珠，在黑暗的天鹅绒上闪闪发光！现在，我只有最后一个问题要问……”{n}婕伊脸上闪过一丝意有所图的微笑。她朝你靠了过来，毫无羞耻感地注视着你的双眼，完全无视周围军官不快的目光，等待着你的回答。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没有任何事情能让我放弃这件珍宝，亲爱的。愿至高无上的神皇见证这一切！祂与科罗努斯扩区的群星，仿佛散落在银河系的珍珠，在黑暗的天鹅绒上闪闪发光！现在，我只有最后一个问题要问……”{n}婕伊脸上闪过一丝意有所图的微笑。她朝你靠了过来，毫无羞耻感地注视着你的双眼，完全无视周围军官不快的目光，等待着你的回答。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

languages.text: «Nada hará que me aleje de este tesoro, shereen, ¡con el Exaltado y todas las estrellas de la Extensión, con su resplandor perlado sobre el tapiz de terciopelo negro de la galaxia como testigos! Solo tengo una última pregunta...». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa conspiratoria, se inclina hacia delante y te mira a los ojos sin ninguna vergüenza, ignorando las miradas reprobatorias de los oficiales mientras espera tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nada hará que me aleje de este tesoro, shereen, ¡con el Exaltado y todas las estrellas de la Extensión, con su resplandor perlado sobre el tapiz de terciopelo negro de la galaxia como testigos! Solo tengo una última pregunta...». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa conspiratoria, se inclina hacia delante y te mira a los ojos sin ninguna vergüenza, ignorando las miradas reprobatorias de los oficiales mientras espera tu respuesta.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「何者にもこの宝物は手放させはしないよ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしの証人だ…彼と、銀河の暗いビロードに散らばる一握りの真珠のように輝くエクスパンスのすべての星々が！最後にもう一つ、尋ねておきたいことがある…」{n}ジェイは陰謀めいた笑みを浮かべ、身を乗り出し、恥ずかしげもなくあなたの視線をまっすぐに見据える。周囲を取り巻く警備員たちの不愉快そうな顔などまったく気にせず、彼女はあなたの返事を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何者にもこの宝物は手放させはしないよ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしの証人だ…彼と、銀河の暗いビロードに散らばる一握りの真珠のように輝くエクスパンスのすべての星々が！最後にもう一つ、尋ねておきたいことがある…」{n}ジェイは陰謀めいた笑みを浮かべ、身を乗り出し、恥ずかしげもなくあなたの視線をまっすぐに見据える。周囲を取り巻く警備員たちの不愉快そうな顔などまったく気にせず、彼女はあなたの返事を待っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nichts kann mich dazu bringen, mich von diesem Schatz zu trennen, Shereen, möge der Erhabene mein Zeuge sein — er und alle Sterne der Ausdehnung, die wie Perlen auf dem dunklen Samt der Galaxie strahlen! Ich habe nur noch eine letzte Frage ..." {n}Jae lächelt verschwörerisch, beugt sich vor und hält deinen Blick völlig schamlos. Sie ignoriert die missbilligenden Blicke der Offiziere um euch herum, während sie auf deine Antwort wartet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nichts kann mich dazu bringen, mich von diesem Schatz zu trennen, Shereen, möge der Erhabene mein Zeuge sein — er und alle Sterne der Ausdehnung, die wie Perlen auf dem dunklen Samt der Galaxie strahlen! Ich habe nur noch eine letzte Frage ..." {n}Jae lächelt verschwörerisch, beugt sich vor und hält deinen Blick völlig schamlos. Sie ignoriert die missbilligenden Blicke der Offiziere um euch herum, während sie auf deine Antwort wartet.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Rien ne me séparera de ce trésor, shereen. Que l'Exalté m'en soit témoin, lui et toutes les étoiles des Étendues qui brillent comme une poignée de perles éparpillées sur le velours noir de la galaxie ! Il y a juste une chose que j'aimerais vous demander... » {n}Jae vous lance un sourire complice, se penche vers vous et soutient votre regard de manière éhontée en attendant votre réponse, sans prêter la moindre attention aux regards désapprobateurs des officiers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne me séparera de ce trésor, shereen. Que l'Exalté m'en soit témoin, lui et toutes les étoiles des Étendues qui brillent comme une poignée de perles éparpillées sur le velours noir de la galaxie ! Il y a juste une chose que j'aimerais vous demander... » {n}Jae vous lance un sourire complice, se penche vers vous et soutient votre regard de manière éhontée en attendant votre réponse, sans prêter la moindre attention aux regards désapprobateurs des officiers.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Beni bu hazineden hiçbir şey ayıramaz şirinim. Görkemli ve galaksinin siyah kadifesine dağılmış inciler gibi Enginlik'te parlayan yıldızlar şahidim olsun! Sadece son bir soru daha sormak istiyorum." {n}Jae bilinçli bir şekilde gülümseyip sana doğru eğiliyor, etraftaki subayların kınayıcı bakışlarını görmezden geliyor ve edepsiz bakışlarla gözlerini tutsak ederek yanıtını bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing will make me part with this treasure, shereen, may the Exalted One be my witness — Him and all the stars in the Expanse that shine like a handful of pearls scattered across the dark velvet of the galaxy! I only have one last question to ask..." {n}Jae flashes a conspiratorial smile, leans forward, and shamelessly holds your gaze, completely ignoring the disapproving looks of the surrounding officers as she waits for your reply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni bu hazineden hiçbir şey ayıramaz şirinim. Görkemli şahidim olsun. O ve galaksinin siyah kadifesine dağılmış inciler gibi Enginlik'te parlayan yıldızlar şahidim olsun! Sadece son bir soru daha sormak istiyorum." {n}Jae gülümsüyor ve komplocu bir tavırla ileri doğru eğiliyor, etraftaki subayların kınayan bakışlarını görmezden geliyor ve gözlerini, edepsizce bakışlarla tutsak ederek yanıt vermeni bekliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
